keyword: calories in a chocolate glazed doughnut
title: Calories in a Chocolate Glazed Doughnut
meta_description: Discover calories in a chocolate glazed doughnut, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, fat, protein, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in a Chocolate Glazed Doughnut
assumptions: Standard yeast-raised doughnut with chocolate icing glaze, similar to Krispy Kreme; approximately 52 g weight, fried in oil.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, size, frying method, and icing thickness. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A chocolate glazed doughnut typically contains about 220 kcal, with high carbs from dough and sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a chocolate glazed doughnut?
faqs.a: Approximately 220 kcal for one standard chocolate glazed doughnut.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a chocolate glazed doughnut?
faqs.a: About 30 g total carbs, including 15 g sugars and 1 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a chocolate glazed doughnut high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 10 g total fat, with 5 g saturated fat from frying and icing.

faqs.q: How much protein in a chocolate glazed doughnut?
Does brand affect calories in chocolate glazed doughnuts?
faqs.a: Yes, variations like Dunkin' or homemade can range from 200-300 kcal; always verify specific labels.
